articles.title: Kids start paying attention to accuracy at about age four - Ars Technica
articles.description: Early on, they're likely to trust humans; a bit later, performance matters more.
articles.content:

articles.title: Fuel leak forces US company to abandon moon landing attempt - BusinessLine
articles.description: Astrobotic Technology’s lander began losing fuel soon after Monday’s launch, possibly because of a ruptured tank. The spacecraft had trouble keeping its solar panel pointed towards the sun and generating solar power, as flight controllers scrambled to salvage…
articles.content:
A crippling fuel leak forced a US company on Tuesday to give up on landing a spacecraft on the moon.
